```scss
// Property: audioStreamType
// Description: The audio stream type to use when playing the sound.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.Notification
'.audio-stream-type-alarm': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_ALARM }
'.audio-stream-type': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_DEFAULT }
'.audio-stream-type-music': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_MUSIC }
'.audio-stream-type-notification': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_NOTIFICATION }
'.audio-stream-type-ring': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_RING }
'.audio-stream-type-system': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_SYSTEM }
'.audio-stream-type-voice-call': { audioStreamType: Ti.Android.STREAM_VOICE_CALL }
```
